mapper.select: SELECT SUM(conAmount) AS MONTHSUM, SUBSTR(condate,1,7) AS CURRENT_MONTH FROM T_CONSUME_HISTORY WHERE TO_DATE(CONDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${month}) AND LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${month})) AND POCKETCODE=3 AND ID=#{id} GROUP BY SUBSTR(condate,1,7)

SELECT conAmount, ROUND(TO_NUMBER(TO_DATE(CONDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')-TO_DATE('01-01-1970 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'))*24*60*60*1000) AS CONDATE FROM T_CONSUME_HISTORY WHERE TO_DATE(CONDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthStart}) AND LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthEnd})) AND POCKETCODE=3 AND ID=#{id} ORDER BY CONDATE DESC

SELECT SUBSTR(CONDATE,0,10) AS CONDATE,SUM(B.CONAMOUNT) AS CONAMOUNT FROM T_CONSUME_CATEGORY A, T_CONSUME_HISTORY B WHERE (TO_DATE(CONDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),${monthStart}) AND LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthEnd}))) AND A.CATECODE = B.CATECODE AND B.ID=#{id} AND POCKETCODE=3 GROUP BY SUBSTR(CONDATE,0,10) order by CONDATE ASC

SELECT SUM(CONAMOUNT) AS SUM ,DECODE(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CONDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')-1,'D'), '1', '월요일', '2', '화요일', '3', '수요일' ,'4', '목요일', '5', '금요일', '6', '토요일', '7', '일요일') AS DAY FROM T_CONSUME_HISTORY WHERE ID=#{id} AND POCKETCODE=3 AND TO_DATE(CONDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),${monthStart}) AND LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthEnd})) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CONDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')-1,'D') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CONDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')-1,'D')

SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CONDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'DD') AS DAY, SUM(CONAMOUNT) AS AMOUNT_SUM, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(CONAMOUNT) DESC) RANK FROM T_CONSUME_HISTORY where ID=#{id} AND POCKETCODE=3 AND TO_DATE(CONDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthStart}) AND LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthEnd})) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CONDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'DD')

SELECT B.CATENAME1 AS CATE1, COUNT(B.CATENAME1) AS COUNT, sum(A.conamount) as AMOUNT FROM T_CONSUME_HISTORY A, T_CONSUME_CATEGORY B WHERE A.CATECODE=B.CATECODE AND ID=#{id} AND POCKETCODE=3 AND TO_DATE(A.CONDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthStart}) AND LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthEnd})) GROUP BY B.CATENAME1

SELECT B.CATENAME1 AS CATE2, B.CATENAME3 AS CATE3, COUNT(B.CATENAME1) AS COUNT, sum(A.conamount) as AMOUNT FROM T_CONSUME_HISTORY A, T_CONSUME_CATEGORY B WHERE A.CATECODE=B.CATECODE AND ID=#{id} AND POCKETCODE=3 AND TO_DATE(CONDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthStart}) AND LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthEnd})) GROUP BY B.CATENAME1, B.CATENAME3

SELECT B.CATENAME2 AS cate2, B.CATENAME3 AS cate3, COUNT(B.CATENAME3) AS cate3count, sum(A.conamount) as conamount1 FROM T_CONSUME_HISTORY A, T_CONSUME_CATEGORY B WHERE A.CATECODE=B.CATECODE AND ID=#{id} AND POCKETCODE=3 AND TO_DATE(A.CONDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthStart}) AND LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthEnd})) GROUP BY B.CATENAME3, B.CATENAME2 ORDER BY cate3count DESC

SELECT CONNAME, CONAMOUNT, DAY, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CONDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'HH24:MI') AS TIME FROM T_CONSUME_HISTORY A, (SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CONDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'DD') AS DAY, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(CONAMOUNT) DESC) RANK FROM T_Consume_History WHERE TO_DATE(CONDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthStart}) AND LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthEnd})) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CONDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'DD') ORDER BY rank) B WHERE TO_DATE(CONDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthStart}) AND LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthEnd})) AND SUBSTR(A.CONDATE,9,2)=B.DAY AND ID=#{id} AND POCKETCODE=3 ORDER BY B.RANK

SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CONDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'MM') AS MONTH, SUM(CONAMOUNT) AS SUM FROM T_CONSUME_HISTORY WHERE ID=#{id} AND POCKETCODE=3 AND TO_DATE(CONDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthStart}) AND LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthEnd})) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CONDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'MM') ORDER BY MONTH ASC

SELECT A.CONDATE, A.CONAMOUNT, B.CATENAME3 FROM T_CONSUME_HISTORY A, T_CONSUME_CATEGORY B WHERE A.CATECODE=B.CATECODE AND ID=#{id} AND POCKETCODE=3 AND TO_DATE(CONDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthStart}) AND LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthEnd}))

SELECT B.CATENAME3 AS cate3, COUNT(B.CATENAME3) AS CATE3COUNT, sum(A.conamount) as CATE3AMOUNT FROM T_CONSUME_HISTORY A, T_CONSUME_CATEGORY B WHERE A.CATECODE=B.CATECODE AND ID=#{id} AND POCKETCODE=3 AND TO_DATE(CONDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),${monthStart}) AND LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthEnd})) GROUP BY B.CATENAME3 ORDER BY CATE3COUNT DESC

SELECT COUNT(B.CATENAME3) AS COUNT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CONDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'MM') AS MONTH, SUM(A.CONAMOUNT) AS SUM FROM T_CONSUME_HISTORY A, T_CONSUME_CATEGORY B, (SELECT a.CATENAME3 AS CATENAME3 FROM (SELECT COUNT(B.CATENAME3) AS COUNT, B.CATENAME3 FROM T_CONSUME_HISTORY A, T_CONSUME_CATEGORY B WHERE A.CATECODE=B.CATECODE AND ID=#{id} AND POCKETCODE=3 AND TO_DATE(CONDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),${monthStart}) AND LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthEnd})) GROUP BY B.CATENAME3 ORDER BY COUNT DESC) a WHERE ROWNUM<=1) C WHERE A.CATECODE=B.CATECODE AND ID=#{id} AND TO_DATE(CONDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),${monthStart}) AND LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthEnd})) AND B.CATENAME3=C.CATENAME3 AND POCKETCODE=3 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CONDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'MM') ORDER BY COUNT

SELECT COUNT(B.CATENAME3) AS COUNT, sum(a.conamount) AS AMOUNT, B.CATENAME3 AS CATENAME3 FROM T_CONSUME_HISTORY A, T_CONSUME_CATEGORY B WHERE A.CATECODE=B.CATECODE AND ID= #{id} AND TO_DATE(CONDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),-6) AND LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), -1)) AND B.CATENAME3='${cate3Name}' AND POCKETCODE=3 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CONDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'MM'), B.CATENAME3

SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CONDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'MM') AS MONTH, SUM(A.CONAMOUNT) AS SUM, COUNT(B.CATENAME3) AS CATENAME3 FROM T_CONSUME_HISTORY A, T_CONSUME_CATEGORY B, (SELECT a.CATENAME3 AS CATENAME3 FROM (SELECT SUM(A.CONAMOUNT) AS SUM, B.CATENAME3 FROM T_CONSUME_HISTORY A, T_CONSUME_CATEGORY B WHERE A.CATECODE=B.CATECODE AND ID= #{id} AND TO_DATE(CONDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),${monthStart}) AND LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthEnd})) GROUP BY B.CATENAME3 ORDER BY SUM DESC) a WHERE ROWNUM<=1) C WHERE A.CATECODE=B.CATECODE AND ID= #{id} AND TO_DATE(CONDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),${monthStart}) AND LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), ${monthEnd})) AND B.CATENAME3=C.CATENAME3 AND POCKETCODE=3 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CONDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'MM') ORDER BY SUM DESC
